= Masapi's User Guide =

You'll find here interesting links to use masapi into your application. You can begin by check the [http://code.google.com/p/masapi/wiki/QuickStart Quick Start Guide].

== Masapi's basic ==

  * [http://code.google.com/p/masapi/wiki/Installation Install] the masapi library
  * Manage the [http://code.google.com/p/masapi/wiki/EventsHandling masapi's events]
  * How to handle the [http://code.google.com/p/masapi/wiki/ErrorsHandling download errors]
  * How to get the [http://code.google.com/p/masapi/wiki/ProgressionInfo progression information]
  * Manage the [http://code.google.com/p/masapi/wiki/OverallProgression overall progression]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/masapi/wiki/RetrieveData Retrieve the data] of the loaded files
  * [http://code.google.com/p/masapi/wiki/PauseResume Pause & Resume] a massive loading
  * Defines the [http://code.google.com/p/masapi/wiki/LoadingPolicy loading policy] (or what do to if a download fails)
  * Manage the [http://code.google.com/p/masapi/wiki/FontsManagement embedded fonts]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/masapi/wiki/FAQ Frequently Asked Questions] (FAQ)

== Masapi's advanced topics ==

  * About the [http://code.google.com/p/masapi/wiki/LoaderContextManagement LoaderContext management]
  * Manage the [http://code.google.com/p/masapi/wiki/FileDependencies file dependencies]
  * Extend the [http://code.google.com/p/masapi/wiki/ExtendSupportedFileTypes supported file types]
  * Extend the [http://code.google.com/p/masapi/wiki/ExtendSupportedLoadManagers supported load managers]
